p:
with the necessary helped the said John Harding in to your custody in the said jail and him there safely keep until he is discharged by due cause of law given under my hand this 23 day of December A. D. 1878 Deniah Meuns Justice of the Peace. Verfiy that this is a true copy of the origninal commitment know in my hand. G. W. L. Allen Sherrif of Whaterun County Washington Territory Commitment Filed Jan 2 1878 for searey clerk
Deputy.
